title: UPDATE: Katelin Akens
description:
In this update episode, Ashley gets the chance to talk to Lisa, Katelin's mom, about Katelin's case, and like, you all asked... What about Katelin's step-father?   

 

For current Fan Club membership options and policies, please visit https://crimejunkieapp.com/library/. 

Episode Sources: Interview with Katelin Akens’ mother Lisa – conducted by Ashley Flowers.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
